title: LeaverBuster
body: Ok so I was in a game I was told on my phone my relative died I came back and  played for 25 mins, then arfter the game I had to wait for 100 mins ? like what can u please I beg of u nerf the times, like league is one of the only thing I have and your making me wait 20 mmins for 5 games {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
